articles.title: Global virus cases surpass five million - 9News

articles.title: Virus circulating in February before first transmission: Italian study - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The study of blood samples by donors showed that 4.6 per cent already had antibodies against the virus at the start of the epidemic.
articles.content: Milan: A study by Milan's Polyclinic hospital indicates the coronavirus was circulating among a random sample of blood donors with no symptoms in Milan before the first domestically transmitted case … [+622 chars]
